demos.name: SBD
demos.description: The SBD package, for Sparse Bessel Decomposition, is dedicated to accelerating and compressing the discrete convolutions in 2D using decompositions in sums of Bessel functions and Non uniform Fast Fourier Transform. The code allows to create operators A(i,j) = K(|x_i - x_j|) where K is a R⁺ -> R function called the Kernel of the convlution, and x is a cloud of points in R². The matrix vector product A*b is computed in less than N² operations and not all the terms A(i,j) need to be stored.
